revision.text:
This is an index to polytheistic [[deity|deities]] of the different religions, cultures and mythologies of the world, listed by type and by region. This is not a list of names or epithets of God in monotheistic religions, for which see "[[Names of God]]". For deified individuals see "[[List of people who have been considered deities]]", "[[Apotheosis]]" and "[[Imperial cult]]". For deities whose cult is fictional see "[[List of deities in fiction]]". {| align="right" | __TOC__ |}
==By classification==
Lists of deities by classification: ===[[King of the Gods|Ruler of the Pantheon]]=== ===[[Sky|Celestial]], [[Religious cosmology|Cosmological]]===
[[File:Baronne Rigoley d'Ogny as Aurora by Nattier.jpg|thumb|right|125px|Baronne Rigoley d'Ogny as [[Aurora (mythology)|Aurora]], by [[Jean-Marc Nattier]], [[Baltimore Museum of Art]]]] *[[creator deity|Creator]] *[[lunar deity|Moon]] *[[Sky god|Sky]] *[[List of solar deities|Sun]] *[[Time and fate deities|Time]] *[[weather god|Weather, rain, thunder, lightning]]
===[[Chthonic]]===
*[[Mother goddess|Mother Earth]] *[[List of night deities|Night]] *[[Water deity|Ocean, water]]
===[[Human sphere]]===
*[[death deity|Death]] *[[sky father|Father]], [[mother goddess|Mother]] *[[time and fate deities|Fate]] *[[list of fertility deities|Fertility]], [[List of love and lust deities|love, lust]] *[[health deity|Health, healing, medicine]] *[[household deity|Household, hearth]] *[[Hunting god|Hunting]] *[[knowledge deity|Knowledge or wisdom]] *[[Liminal deity|Thresholds, doorways]] *[[Trickster]] *[[List of war deities|War]]
===[[Demigod]]s, [[List of people who have been considered deities|Deified Heroes]]===
*[[Culture hero]]es *[[Imperial cult]] *[[Sacred king]]
==By cultural sphere==
===Near East and North Africa=== [[File:Standing Osiris edit1.svg|thumb|right|125px|[[Osiris]], lord of the dead. His green skin symbolizes rebirth]] *[[Religions of the ancient Near East|Ancient Near East]] **[[Egyptian pantheon#List of deities of Ancient Egypt|Ancient Egyptian deities]] **[[List of Mesopotamian deities|Mesopotamian deities]] ***[[Kassite deities]] **[[Ancient Semitic religion|Semitic gods]]: see [[El (god)|El]], [[Elohim]] ***[[Assyro-Babylonian pantheon]] (see also [[Family tree of the Babylonian gods]]) ***[[Canaanite deities]] **[[Anatolia]] ***[[hittite mythology|Hittite deities]] ***[[Hurrian deities]] ***[[Lydian gods|Lydian deities]] **[[Caucasus]] ***[[Armenian mythology#Pantheon|Armenian deities]] ***[[Ossetian deities]] **[[Persia]]: see [[Yazata]], see also [[Proto-Indo-Iranian religion]] *[[North Africa]]: [[Berber mythology]] *[[Arabian mythology|Pre-Islamic Arabian deities]]
===Central / Northern Asia=== *[[Siberian mythology|Siberian]] **[[Kutkh|Raven God of Kamchatka and Chukotka]] *[[Mythology of the Turkic and Mongolian peoples|Turco-Mongol]] **[[Tengri]]
===East Asia=== *[[chinese mythology|Chinese deities]] *[[Japanese deities]] *[[Korean deities]] *[[List of bodhisattvas]]
===India / South Asia=== [[File:Cowdivine.jpg|thumb|right|220px|The image illustrates the Hindu belief that each part of the [[cow]] embodies a particular deity]] *[[Hindu deities]] **[[Rigvedic deities]] (see also [[Proto-Indo-Iranian religion]]) ===Southeast Asia=== *[[Deities of Philippine mythology]] *[[Malaysian Chinese Gods]]
===[[Europe]]=== *[[Baltic deities]] *[[Celtic deities]] **[[List of Irish mythological figures|Irish deities]] *[[Etruscan deities]] *[[Finnic deities]] *[[Germanic deities]] **[[Anglo-Saxon deities]] **[[List of Norse gods and goddesses]] *[[Religion in ancient Greece|Greek pantheon]] (see also [[List of Greek mythological figures]], [[Twelve Olympians]], [[Greek hero cult]], [[Family tree of the Greek gods]]) *[[Hungarian deities]] *[[List of Roman deities]] *[[Lusitani deities]] *[[Paleo-Balkanic deities]] (Thracian/Dacian/Illyrian) *[[Sami mythology|Sami deities]] *[[Slavic deities]] Famous Serbian Deity - Nenad Dragicevic And Princess Dajana Gojkic
===[[Sub-Saharan Africa]]=== [[Image:Mami Wata poster.png|125px|thumb|right|Contemporary poster of a [[Mami Wata]], "serpent priestess" painted by German ([[Hamburg]]) artist Schleisinger, ca. 1926, displayed in shrines as a popular image of Mami Wata in Africa and in the Diaspora.<ref>Jell-Bahlsen 1997, p. 105</ref><ref>Chesi 1997, p. 255)</ref>]]
*[[African deities]] **[[Alusi]] **[[Guanches#System_of_beliefs|Guanche deities]] **[[List of Yoruba deities|Yoruba deities]] *[[Afro-American religion]] **[[Loa]] **[[Orisha]]
===[[Americas]]=== *[[Mesoamerica]] **[[Aztec deities]] **[[Maya deities]] *[[North America]] **[[Inuit deities]] **[[Native American deities]] *[[South America]] **[[Incan deities]] **[[Guarani mythology|Guarani]] **[[Mapuche mythology|Mapuche]]
===[[Australia]]-[[Oceania]]=== *[[Australian Aboriginal deities]] *[[List of Māori deities|Māori deities]] *[[Polynesian mythology|Polynesian deities]] *[[Rapa Nui mythology|Rapa Nui deities]] (Easter Island)
==Syncretic mythologies== * [[Ascended master|List of Theosophical/Ascended Master Teachings deities]]
